title: If The Shoe Fits
description: No running away this time. Chasing Janie is Bryant's new obsession   It was just a one night stand with a stranger, right? How wrong could you be and what does a girl do when she finds out that the handsome stranger she has never forgotton is now her CEO? Bryant was the one to run away on that fateful night but now that Janie was once more within his grasp he wasn't about to let her slip away this time, even if it meant that the chase was on.  **A modern take on the Cinderella theme but with plenty of thrills and a little tension. Rita Ames likes to shake things up in her books with the occasional unexpected plot twist so why not give this book a spin and see where the shoes fall.
author: Rita Ames
